name: Bird Boxes - Bubble Time
description:
"Bird Boxes - Bubble Time" is an exciting puzzle game. Cute graphics, cool effects, and simple game play.

=== How To Play ===

Move three or more of the same bird into horizontal or vertical line, to make them bubble. Clear all birds from the screen to pass the level. Keep play to unlock the next challenge levels.

=== Features ===

- 48 challenge levels
- Cool music
- Easy touch to play
- Leaderboard to show your level

What are you waiting for? Download now to experience the most classic fun!
